title: X2: X-Men United Spoiler Special
content: Ali is joined by comedian and friend of the show Jordan Gray for an extended, spoilerific, conversation all about one of the finest super hero movies ever, X2: X-Men United.
contentSnippet: Ali is joined by comedian and friend of the show Jordan Gray for an extended, spoilerific, conversation all about one of the finest super hero movies ever, X2: X-Men United.

itunes.author: BBC Radio 1
itunes.subtitle: Ali and Jordan Gray chat in spoilerific detail about 2003's X2.
